[Groovy] Class StreetAddress

java.lang.Object
  StreetAddress
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
class StreetAddress

This class represents an address. This can be a deliverable, or non-deliverable address. This supports international addresses.

Property Summary
java.lang.String address

This is the street address line
java.lang.String address2

This is an additional street address line if needed, but shouldn't be necessary.

java.lang.String appCreated

This field should be assigned the name of the application that is creating an instance of this class.
java.lang.String city

This is the proper city name.

static java.lang.Object constraints

This contains any constraints for the domain class.

Country country

This is the country the address resides in
java.lang.String county

This is the county of the address if needed
java.util.Date dateCreated

This field is automatically assigned the date that this particular ContactRole instance was created
java.lang.String internationalPostalCode

If this is a Non-US address, this is the international postal delivery code for the address.

java.util.Date lastUpdated

This field should be propogated with the current date and time "new Date()" that an instance of this class is updated.

boolean standardized

This flags whether or not this address has been cleaned an standardized.

java.lang.String state

If this is a US or CA address, this is the two-letter abbreviation for the state or province.
static java.lang.Object transients

This is the transient used by this class.

java.lang.String userCreated

This field should be assigned the username of the authenticated user that is creating an instance of this class.
java.lang.String userUpdated

This field should be propogated with the username of the authenticated user when an instance of this class is updated.
boolean uspsDeliverable

This flags whether or not USPS mail can be delivered here.

int zip4

If this is a US address, this is the 4 digit zip4 extension for the zip code if the address has been cleaned and standardized.
int zipCode

If this is a US address, this is the 5 digit zip code for the address
 
Constructor Summary
StreetAddress()

 
Method Summary
java.lang.String getCityStateZip()

This is an output formating helper function that returns the City + State + Zipcode line for a mailing address.

Property Detail

address

java.lang.String address
This is the street address line

address2

java.lang.String address2
This is an additional street address line if needed, but shouldn't be necessary. Avoid using this if possible.

appCreated

java.lang.String appCreated
This field should be assigned the name of the application that is creating an instance of this class.

city

java.lang.String city
This is the proper city name. Do not abbreviate here, if the city is Saint Paul, do NOT use St. Paul.

constraints

static java.lang.Object constraints
This contains any constraints for the domain class. Non-default constraints for this class are
address
this can be no longer than 64 characters, the USPS guidelines state 40 characters as the max.
address2
this is optional (nullable), and can be no longer than 64 characters, the USPS guidelines state 40 characters as the max.
city
this is optional (nullable), and has a maximum length of 30 characters
state
this is optional (nullable), and has a maximum length of 2 characters
zipCode
this is optional (nullable), and has an allowable range of 00000-99999
zip4
this is optional (nullable), and has an allowable range of 0000-9999
county
this is optional (nullable)
country
this is optional (nullable)
internationalPostalCode
this is optional (nullable), and has a maximum length of 16 characters
userCreated
16 characters
appCreated
the attribute can be no longer than 50 characters

country

Country country
This is the country the address resides in

county

java.lang.String county
This is the county of the address if needed

dateCreated

java.util.Date dateCreated
This field is automatically assigned the date that this particular ContactRole instance was created

internationalPostalCode

java.lang.String internationalPostalCode
If this is a Non-US address, this is the international postal delivery code for the address. Some countries do not use this, Canada does.

lastUpdated

java.util.Date lastUpdated
This field should be propogated with the current date and time "new Date()" that an instance of this class is updated. Grails will automatically take care of this per section 5.5.1 of the Grails 1.3.7 documentation.

standardized

boolean standardized
This flags whether or not this address has been cleaned an standardized. Do NOT set this to true unless this address has in fact been processed by an address standardization program such as Semaphore ZP4, or StrikeIron.

state

java.lang.String state
If this is a US or CA address, this is the two-letter abbreviation for the state or province.

transients

static java.lang.Object transients
This is the transient used by this class. See getCityStateZip() for details.

userCreated

java.lang.String userCreated
This field should be assigned the username of the authenticated user that is creating an instance of this class.

userUpdated

java.lang.String userUpdated
This field should be propogated with the username of the authenticated user when an instance of this class is updated.

uspsDeliverable

boolean uspsDeliverable
This flags whether or not USPS mail can be delivered here. Some US addresses must be delivered to a P.O. Box rather than the actual address of the house.

zip4

int zip4
If this is a US address, this is the 4 digit zip4 extension for the zip code if the address has been cleaned and standardized.

zipCode

int zipCode
If this is a US address, this is the 5 digit zip code for the address

 
Constructor Detail

StreetAddress

StreetAddress()

 
Method Detail

getCityStateZip

java.lang.String getCityStateZip()
This is an output formating helper function that returns the City + State + Zipcode line for a mailing address. This is commonly the bottom line on a US postal delivery address.
